Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19852941]Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus cereus (MIC=5.8 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=12.3 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=10.4 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli Edl 933 (MIC=3.2 µg/ml), E. coli MG/655 (MIC=4.2 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.19852941]Insignificant hemolytic activity even up to 150 μg/ml against rabbit red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: Has antimicrobial activity and weak hemolytic.
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Expressed in the fat body, hemocytes and salivary glands of partially-fed female ticks. Not expressed in the midgut.

Literature.Title: Exploring the sialome of the tick Ixodes scapularis.
Literature.Author: Valenzuela JG, Francischetti IM, Pham VM, Garfield MK, Mather TN, Ribeiro JM.

Literature.Title: Purification and characterization of a novel salivary antimicrobial peptide from the tick, Ixodes scapularis.
Literature.Author: Pichu S, Ribeiro JM, Mather TN.
